sentences.sContent: Some of the projects will also support conservation efforts of near-extinct animals in Kalimantan, including rhinoceros, Irrawaddy dolphins, and orangutans.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of the projects will also support conservation efforts of near-extinct animals in Kalimantan, including rhinoceros, Irrawaddy dolphins, and orangutans.
sentences.sCn: 其中一些项目也将支持对加里曼丹濒危动物的保护活动，包括犀牛、伊洛瓦底江海豚和猩猩。

trans.tranOther: a large heavy African or Asian animal with thick skin and either one or two horns on its nose
